comments:
Description: error message is not friendly if selected data is out of bound for a chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a chart and bind it to a dataset with parameter.
2. Set a parameter in chart parameter dialog which doesn't return any value.
3. Click on "OK". Exception is thrown out and chart isn't displayed properly.
